mapper.insert: INSERT INTO USERS (NAME, ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, TEL, RANK, DEPARTMENT, BIRTH, UPDATEDAT, CREATEDAT, ROLE) VALUES (#{name}, #{id}, #{password}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{rank}, #{department}, #{birth}, #{updatedAt}, #{createdAt}, #{role})
mapper.select: SELECT NAME, ID, PASSWORD, EMAIL, TEL, RANK, DEPARTMENT, BIRTH, UPDATEDAT, CREATEDAT, ROLE AS ROLE FROM USERS ORDER BY CREATEDAT DESC
